void SDLFrame::initializeSDLWindow (  )  [protected]

Set's up our SDL window to cooperate with the ogre window.

Impelements the SDL window id hack. See: http://www.ogre3d.org/wiki/index.php/Using_SDL_Input

reads the config file and sets width, height, fullscreen

Parameters:

height set to the height in the config variable
fullscreen set according to the fullscreen flag in the config variable
